amendment.description: Amendment replaces the current definition of Major Swap Participant with the definition that was reported out of the House Agriculture Committee.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 111-370 to replace the current definition of Major Swap Participant with the definition that was reported out of the House Agriculture Committee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (NY) amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 304 - 124 (Roll no. 956).
